intro

intro.Rmd
# library(transcribe)

Introduction

This vignette introduces the transcribe package. The package provides an R interface to transcribe audio using Whisper, with optional post‐processing via Ollama.

Installation 

# Install from GitHub (if not on CRAN yet)
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("YourUserName/transcribe")

Basic Usage

Below is a minimal example showing how to transcribe an audio file:

# library(transcribe) # Uncomment once your package is installed
# transcript <- transcribe_audio(
#   input_path = "path/to/audio.wav",
#   language = "en",
#   whisper_model_name = "large-v3-turbo",
#   processed = TRUE,
#   ollama_model = "llama3.2"
# )
# cat(transcript)

Plumber Integration

You can serve a web interface via plumber:

# library(plumber)
# plumber::plumb("inst/plumber/api.R")$run()

Open your browser at http://127.0.0.1:port to see the interface.

Conclusion

This vignette covered the basics of installing and using transcribe for audio transcription. See the README or additional vignettes for more details.
